item.title: EXC
item.description: score:108 Chances: ComEd being honored with dual Inspiring Efficiency Awards shows their commitment to innovative programs and energy efficiency. Partnership with CALSTART, EPRI, Clean Energy Works, WRI, and EEI demonstrates Exelon’s dedication to environmental justice and health benefits. Accepting applications for college scholarships through the Future of Energy Scholars program reflects ComEd’s investment in the future workforce.
